participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and competitive, always seeking new challenges.
participant_1.background: I am content with being a welder and rock climber. I once ran the mile in under 4 minutes. I am a professional bowler. I live in the suburbs because it is a quiet place where I can relax and enjoy my family and friends. I often do not have the money to pay my utility bills.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Optimistic and easy-going, I enjoy life’s simple pleasures.
participant_2.background: I once pretended to be my own lawyer and got the ticket dismissed. I'm from Seattle. I love iced tea. I love the mushroom ravioli in my home town, but it's nothing compared to the fresh mushrooms I ate in the Amazon! I love the desert.

content.text: It's going great! I just got back from a run.
That's awesome! How far did you go?
I ran a mile in under 4 minutes!
Wow! That's impressive! I've never run a mile in under 6 minutes.
Thanks! I used to be a professional bowler, so I'm pretty fast.
That's so cool! I love bowling. I'm from Seattle, so I've been bowling my whole life.
That's awesome! I've never been to Seattle. I'm from the suburbs.
You should come to Seattle! It's a beautiful city.
I'd love to! I love the desert, so I'm sure I'd love Seattle.
You would! It's got a lot of desert-like areas.
That's great! I'm definitely going to have to visit Seattle sometime.
You should! I'm sure you'd love it
